yerusalame winashaya ha yudewwan pituwahal kirima pahatha sandahan, yudew namaskara madhyagathawa araliyagaha pamana sanwidhanaya kara nathara kirima, yachnya pujawa sidu, saha namaskara (wadihiti minisun dasa awama washayen niyojanaya) prajawa saha sthapitha pamana nawatha sadana ladi thani thani jana guruwarun ha nayakayan lesa katayuthu kala ginnen adhikaraya (yudew dayasporawa balanna).

para­jaya pili­gena ethuma sina­musu muhu­nin jana­wari 9 wanida uda­sana ma ara­li­ya­gaha madure sita mada­mu­lana maha­ge­da­rata yana darshana rupa­wa­hini thira­yen bala siti boho dena hangu­mbara wuha. 2015 jana­wari 8 path wu yaha­pa­lana aanduwa dina siyaye wada­sa­ta­hana yatathe sidu kale shri lanka maha bankuwe badu­mkara wanchawa mangin rupi­yal mili­yana gana­nak kolla kama ya.

shri lankawe kirthinamayata hani kirime saha rajaye hamudawan apahasuthawanta pathkirime aramunin brithanya chanal 4 nalikawa asathya widiyo patayak pradarshanaya karana lada athara shri lankawe pawathi manushiya meheyumwala awasan kala samaya padaka karagena nirmanathmaka lesa eya nishpadanaya kara thibe.brithanya chanal fo nalikawa shri lankawe yuda aparadha siduwu bawata karunu dakwamin prasiddhiyata pathkarana lada adala warthamaya widiyowe nirupitha pidawata path drawida janaya sampurnayenma mudal gewana lada el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanaye udawiya bawada nesabi samiwaraya prakashakara atha.me athara palaka konsarwetiw pakshaya niyojanaya karana brithanya agamathiwaraya penwadi thibenne shri lankawa elambaena marthu masaya wanawita abhyanthara parikshanayak sidu nokaranne nam ee sandaha wana jathyanthara swadhina parikshanayak wenuwen sahaya labadena bawayi.namuth eya porondu wu kala ramuwata patahaniwana ayurin brithanya rajaya kriyakarana bawada nesabi samiwaraya penwadi thibe.eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsilaye balapam anuwa eksath rajadhani aanduwa kriya karamin sitinne mandayi hethema brithanya parlimenthuwe di prashna kara atha..
